s: Summary: Breakfast meeting with HashKey Group and Conflux Network discussing the transition from Web3 narrative to concrete deployment.
Topics: Blockchain scaling, institutional adoption, DeFi integration, cross‑chain interoperability, roadmap execution.
Speakers: Senior executives from HashKey Group and core members of Conflux Network.
r: Obtain early visibility into Conflux’s scaling roadmap.
Forge institutional partnerships with HashKey’s venture arm.
Network in an intimate setting with top blockchain strategists.
